summary: This is an email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers to defense counsel in the case US v. Maxwell, transmitting an order that will be docketed the following day. It demonstrates ongoing judicial proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.context: Recipient of the email, appears to be defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in case 20cr330.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is presiding over the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Pagliuca appears to be defense counsel representing Maxwell in the criminal case.
Mennin appears to be defense counsel representing Maxwell in the criminal case.
Both are listed as recipients of the court order, suggesting they are part of the same defense team.

events.title: Court Order Issued in Maxwell Case
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issues an order in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20cr330), which is transmitted to defense counsel via email.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers transmitting a court order in the case US v. Maxwell (docket 20cr330).
The order was issued on November 1, 2021, and was scheduled to be docketed the following morning.
The email was sent to defense counsel Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Mennin, indicating they were representing Ghislaine Maxwell at that time.
The document shows ongoing judicial proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case in late 2021.
